comments: We currently have export, but no import.  The contexts can probably just be copied over, and we already have some support for that.  What will need to be added is a facility for importing the tasks, hits, and queries into the tasklist.  It can start with just an "overwrite existing task list" option, that dumps the overwritten list into a backup file.
This should be straightforward to implement given the current wizard functionality and it is important to have (e.g. bug 127123) so let's get it into 0.4.9.

Created an attachment (id=34892)
Fixed. New wizard for importing task data from file system or zip file

Note that we could improve coverage of the test cases. Currently the tests look over imported root tasks and check that they have context but perhaps we should also be testing for existance of categories and queries.
